titleStmt.title: Acts and laws, passed by the great and general court or assembly of Their Majesties province of the Massachusetts-Bay, in New-England begun at Boston, the thirty-first day of May, 1693, and continued by adjournment, unto Thursday the sixth day of July following : being the second sessions.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bartholomew Green, and sold by Samuel Phillips,
